revisions.*:
{{Main|Weapon Types (Dark Souls III)}}

'''Staves''' are [[:Category:Dark Souls III: Casting Tools|casting tools]] used to cast [[Sorcery (Dark Souls III)|sorceries]]. They are characterized by their modest to high [[Intelligence (Dark Souls III)|Intelligence]] requirement. To cast a sorcery, the player must equip a staff. There are also some weapons that can act as a medium for casting sorceries.

==Staves==
